sentence.Network_en: The peddler was crying up his wares.
sentence.Network_cn: 小贩极力夸耀自己的货物.

sentence.Network_en: The peddler was stuffing the boy with lies.
sentence.Network_cn: 那小贩在撒谎欺骗小孩.

sentence.Network_en: The peddler bawled his wares in the street.

entry.def: A peddler is someone who goes from place to place in order to sell something.
A drug peddler is a person who sells illegal drugs.

entry.tran: （思想或信息的）宣扬者，散布者
entry.def: A peddler of information or ideas is someone who frequently expresses such ideas to other people.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who travels about selling his wares (as on the streets or at carnivals)
2. an unlicensed dealer in illegal drugs

auth_sentence.content: The usual opening line of the street drug peddler.

sentences.en: Peddlers cried their wares in the streets.
